suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider using more vibrant and varied background colors to make each scene stand out more distinctly. For example, the green grass and yellow ground could be made brighter or more saturated. Additionally, using complementary colors for the characters' clothing and the background can create a more striking visual impact. Enhancing the contrast between the brown pillars and their surroundings can also help to make them more prominent. Overall, increasing the saturation and brightness of the colors used will enhance the visual appeal and make the elements more distinguishable.
